chapter.title: &vmil; Publishers.
chapter.para: At the time of writing (28-05-2012) the following &vmil; publishers exist.

listitem.ulink: The CERN Virtual Machine's production images by Predrag Buncic. The CERN Virtual Machine uses CernVMfs to help scientiets run the virtual maschine with LCG software using a HTTP based file system. Many different hypervisors are supported. QEMU/KVM, Xen, VirtualBox, Hyper-V, VMware, VirtualPC.

itemizedlist.listitem:
The DISH Virtual Machine's list by Owen Synge.
DISH is short for DESY Image SHaring. We have images designed for use at DESY and images designed for use in gerneric sites based on Scientific Linux (Generic).
